title: 10casproj
author: 10casproj
created_time: November 22, 2022, 10:50:38 PMLast edit: January 23, 2023, 10:34:18 PM by 10casproj
content: Hi,Looking to buy casascius coins, send me pm's with your offers.Thanks

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Those are great coins. I am sure we would all like to buy them for the right price. What sort of price are you looking to pay for them? I think if you have some guidance there you would be much more likely to get people contacting you to try and arrange a sale. Hope that helps. Good luck finding your coins!

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: Good luck on your search, i recommend only getting graded/authenticated casascius coins as I have heard of fakes being passed off on unsuspecting victims.

comments.author: slimzak
comments.body: When buying high value coins like the one here you will encounter many scammers who will try to pull one off. I recommend not communicating with anyone outside the forums and to use escrow. Double and triple check that each message is coming from the correct person by looking at the trust every time

comments.author: 10casproj
comments.body: Quote from: slimzak on January 17, 2023, 09:02:48 PMWhen buying high value coins like the one here you will encounter many scammers who will try to pull one off. I recommend not communicating with anyone outside the forums and to use escrow. Double and triple check that each message is coming from the correct person by looking at the trust every timeMy account is newbie but been on this for years... anyway always good to remember this to people to avoid things like the 25btc coin that was scammed recently.

comments.author: slimzak
comments.body: Yes of course, always good to be reminded. Most of the scams happen when the deal is really good and the victim rushes to complete the deal without performing the necessary checks. Good luck with the purchase!

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: slimzak on January 17, 2023, 09:39:15 PMYes of course, always good to be reminded. Most of the scams happen when the deal is really good and the victim rushes to complete the deal without performing the necessary checks. Good luck with the purchase! I’m happy to make a deal for a Casascius that is not really good and can take as long as needed if OP wants to make sure they’re getting a legit Casascius coin. Seriously though, I still have no idea what the offer for a 1 BTC brass Casascius coin is but I do have one that I’d be willing to sell for the right price. Feel free to reach out to me with offers OP. I have all the different years and 2 types of the 2011 coins.

comments.author: bitcoinbass
comments.body: Looking for the same type of coins loaded or unloaded. DM offers. Thanks

comments.author: 10casproj
comments.body: Hi,Replied all PMs. Still looking for a few more.
